The Mobile Application provides the following list of features:  ï¼	Employee Clock In\Outï¼	Supervisor Employee Group Clock In\Outï¼	Capture GPS Coordinates at time of Clock In\Out for verification of location *Optimized to 10 meters accuracyï¼	Employee punches will be recorded in Blueforce and marked as âUn-Authorizedâ if the GPS location is outside of the acceptable distance from the work site *Distance is client configurableï¼	Integrated with Blueforceâ¢ TLM System Time card and Timesheet moduleï¼	Location based (GPS) Dropdown list selections for Work Group (Site), Task, and Work Ticket â selections are filtered based on current GPS location.ï¼	Works in offline mode in cases where GPS and Cellular Services are unavailableï¼	Ability to enter free from comments along with the punchesï¼	Consistent look and ease of use similar to EPAY Systems Walter Time clocksï¼	One button click to EPAY Systems Support Team and Help
